question: [File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: get_all_certified_aug_data()] [Certification gap] Can get_all_certified_aug_data() return certified data for some validators but not others, causing incomplete APK state that prevents reaching quorum in randomness generation? (High)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: get_all_certified_aug_data()] [Invalid signatures] Does get_all_certified_aug_data() validate AggregateSignatures before returning CertifiedAugData, or can it return data with invalid/expired signatures that later fail verification? (High)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: get_all_certified_aug_data()] [Consistency with uncertified data] Can get_all_certified_aug_data() return certified data that doesn't correspond to any AugData returned by get_all_aug_data(), causing state inconsistencies? (High)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: get_all_certified_aug_data()] [Cross-epoch contamination] Can get_all_certified_aug_data() return mix of certified data from current and past epochs without proper epoch filtering, causing APK derivation with wrong epoch keys? (High)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: get_all_certified_aug_data()] [Storage backend failure] Can get_all_certified_aug_data() return partial results if storage backend encounters errors mid-iteration, causing validators to have incomplete certified augmented data? (High)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: get_all_certified_aug_data()] [Duplicate certified data] Can get_all_certified_aug_data() return multiple CertifiedAugData entries for the same author/epoch, enabling equivocation or causing validators to have conflicting certified augmented data? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: get_all_certified_aug_data()] [Malicious APK recovery] Can get_all_certified_aug_data() return CertifiedAugData containing compromised augmented public keys that were maliciously certified, allowing attackers to break randomness unpredictability on recovery? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: get_all_certified_aug_data()] [Memory limit bypass] Can get_all_certified_aug_data() return arbitrarily large datasets that exhaust memory, causing out-of-memory crashes during validator recovery? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: get_all_certified_aug_data()] [Concurrent access race] Can concurrent calls to get_all_certified_aug_data() and save_certified_aug_data() cause race conditions where returned data is inconsistent with what's actually persisted? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: get_all_certified_aug_data()] [Deserialization bomb] Can malformed CertifiedAugData with deeply nested or recursive structures cause exponential deserialization time, creating DoS during validator recovery? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: remove_aug_data()] [Incomplete deletion] Can remove_aug_data() fail to delete some AugData entries due to database errors but return Ok(()), causing validators to believe old epoch data was cleaned up when it persists? (High)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: remove_aug_data()] [Wrong epoch deletion] Can remove_aug_data() accidentally delete AugData from the current epoch instead of old epochs due to ID confusion, causing loss of critical augmented data needed for randomness generation? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: remove_aug_data()] [Concurrent save/delete race] Can remove_aug_data() race with save_aug_data() calls, causing newly saved augmented data to be immediately deleted, leading to data loss? (High)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: remove_aug_data()] [Orphaned certified data] Can remove_aug_data() delete uncertified augmented data while leaving corresponding CertifiedAugData in storage, causing inconsistent state? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: remove_aug_data()] [Deletion DoS] Can an attacker trigger excessive remove_aug_data() calls with large Vec<AugData> parameters, causing performance degradation that impacts consensus participation? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: remove_aug_data()] [Partial batch deletion] Does remove_aug_data() ensure atomic deletion of all entries in the Vec, or can partial failures leave some entries deleted and others remaining, causing inconsistent cleanup? (High)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: remove_aug_data()] [Crash during deletion] Can crashes during remove_aug_data() execution leave storage in corrupted state with partially deleted entries that cause recovery failures? (High)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: remove_aug_data()] [ID extraction vulnerability] Can remove_aug_data() use wrong AugDataId when deleting (e.g., if AugData.id() method has bugs), causing deletion of wrong entries? (High)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: remove_aug_data()] [Error handling bypass] Can remove_aug_data() silently ignore deletion errors for some entries while successfully deleting others, without properly propagating errors to callers? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: remove_aug_data()] [Storage leak] If remove_aug_data() is never called due to bugs in epoch transition logic, can augmented data accumulate indefinitely causing disk exhaustion over time? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: remove_certified_aug_data()] [Failed cleanup detection] Can remove_certified_aug_data() fail to delete old epoch certified data but not return errors, causing storage accumulation that eventually crashes validators? (High)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: remove_certified_aug_data()] [Active data deletion] Can remove_certified_aug_data() accidentally delete certified augmented data from current epoch due to wrong filtering logic, causing validators to lose certified APKs needed for randomness generation? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: remove_certified_aug_data()] [Race with certification] Can remove_certified_aug_data() race with save_certified_aug_data(), causing newly certified data to be immediately deleted before it's used? (High)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: remove_certified_aug_data()] [Atomic deletion failure] Can remove_certified_aug_data() partially delete entries from the Vec due to errors, leaving some certified data deleted and some remaining, causing inconsistent state? (High)

[File: consensus/src/rand/rand_gen/storage/interface.rs] [Function: remove_certified_aug_data()] [Orphaned uncertified data] Can remove_certified_aug_data() delete certified data while leaving corresponding uncertified AugData, causing confusion about what data is actually certified? (Medium)
